nodes.text: Star Wars: Legacy Book 1 is the first deluxe hardcover of the first Star Wars: Legacy comic book series. It collects the first 19 issues of the series, plus the series handbook in its #0½ form. These were previously collected in three trade paperback volumes. The hardcover was released June 5, 2013.

The future of Star Wars and the future of the Skywalkers is told in John Ostrander and Jan Duursema's acclaimed Star Wars: Legacy. A Sith legion has conquered the Empire, the Jedi have been scattered, and the galaxy is divided. Into this comes Cade Skywalker, heir to the Skywalker legacy . . .
The deluxe hardcover comes with The Legacy Handbook, which is a guide to the Legacy series. It is 33 pages long and features concept art, ship designs, and other information.
